_ACCESS_DEN_: Sorry, you don't have rights to see this section
_AT_BOTTOM_: This block is on most-down position
_BLC_IN_DB_ALREADY_: Sorry, this block is in database already!
_BLC_USE_SITE_SET_: Please note block width may be adjusted to your current theme, some blocks also use site settings
_CLICK_POS_: Click on Position to calculate. Enabled must be checked
_DLT_WIL_PER_: Delete from this point will be permanent.
_IN_FOLDER_: not in database but exist in blocks folder
_NO_RES_B_: if result is not shown, click one more time after update to refresh.
_NO_RES_T_: if result is not shown, click UPDATE button one more time to refresh!
_SEND_NO_BLOCK_: Make sure that file ends with _block.php.
_SEND_WHAT_: What are you trying to upload!?!
_SURE_FULL_PATH_: and be sure to include full path
_UPL_ADD_: block will be uploaded and enabled on the fly
_UPL_ONLY_: block will be uploaded only - not inserted in database
_WHY_NO_RES_:
In order how page load, left blocks loads before then changes in database take effects.
That is the reason why we need refresh page. Do not press refresh button in your browser.
If you do that previously sent data will be send again and might be errors because some
data not exist in database anymore.
